Report.Name: Error: All Error Events
Report.Description: This report lists all error events

Report.Name: Error: All Warning Events
Report.Description: This report lists all warning events

Report.Name: Change: All Account/Group Change Events
Report.Description: This report lists all account/group change events

SubPattern.name: Filter_VMware_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange) AND vmwEventCat IS NOT NULL

Report.Name: Error: All License Errors
Report.Description: This report lists all license errors

SubPattern.name: Filter_VMware_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_LicenseExpired) AND vmwEventCat IS NOT NULL

Report.Name: Logon: All Successful Logons
Report.Description: This report lists all successful logons

Report.Name: Logon: All Failed Logons
Report.Description: This report lists all failed logons

Report.Name: Events: Top Reporting ESX Servers and Event Types By Count
Report.Description: This report ranks virtual machine hosts (ESX servers) by number of reported events

SubPattern.name: Filter_VMware_20
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType CONTAIN "VMware_*" AND phyMachName IS NOT NULL

Report.Name: Events: Top Reporting VMs and Event Types By Count
Report.Description: This report ranks virtual machines by number of reported events

SubPattern.name: Filter_VMware_21
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType CONTAIN "VMware_*" AND vmName IS NOT NULL

Report.Name: Events: Top VM Event Types By Count
Report.Description: This report ranks vmware event types by number of events

Report.Name: Performance: Top VMs By CPU Utilization
Report.Description: This report ranks virtual machines by cpu utilization

Report.Name: Performance: Top VMs By CPU Utilization With Details
Report.Description: This report ranks virtual machines by cpu utilization. Other CPU usage metrics are included.

Report.Name: Performance: Top VMs By CPU Ready Pct
Report.Description: This report ranks virtual machines by cpu ready percent. A high number indicates the VM is starved of CPU

Report.Name: Performance: Least utilized VMs By CPU
Report.Description: This report ranks virtual machines in the descending order of cpu utilization

Report.Name: Performance: Top VMs By Memory Utilization With Details
Report.Description: This report ranks virtual machines by memory utilization. Other memory usage metrics are included.

Report.Name: Performance: Top VMs By Swap Activity
Report.Description: This report ranks virtual machines by swapping activity

Report.Name: Performance: Top VMs By Memory Utilization
Report.Description: This report ranks virtual machines by memory utilization

Report.Name: Performance: Top VMs By Disk I/O Activity With Details
Report.Description: This report ranks virtual machines by disk I/O activity. Other disk I/O usage metrics are included.

Report.Name: Performance: Top VMs By Disk I/O Read KBps
Report.Description: This report ranks virtual machines by disk I/O read (KBps)

Report.Name: Performance: Top VMs By Disk I/O Write KBps
Report.Description: This report ranks virtual machines by disk I/O writes (KBps)

Report.Name: Availability: Top VMs By Uptime
Report.Description: This report ranks virtual machines by uptime

Report.Name: Availability: Top ESX By Uptime
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by uptime

Report.Name: Availability: ESX By Lowest Uptime
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts with least uptime

Report.Name: Performance: Top ESX By CPU Utilization
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by aggregate cpu utilization. Other CPU usage metrics are included.

Report.Name: Performance: Top ESX By Memory Utilization With Details
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by memory utilization. Other memory usage metrics are included.

Report.Name: Performance: Top ESX By Memory Utilization
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by memory utilization.

Report.Name: Performance: Top ESX By Swap Activity
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by swap activity

Report.Name: Performance: ESX With Balooning Memory
Report.Description: This report identifies ESX hosts with low enough memory where memory balooning technique is used for memory management

SubPattern.name: Filter_VMware_24
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_MEM_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VM_SERVER) AND (freeMemState IN (2,3))

Report.Name: Performance: ESX With Swapping Memory
Report.Description: This report identifies ESX hosts with low memory where swapping memory technique is used for memory management

SubPattern.name: Filter_VMware_24
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_MEM_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VM_SERVER) AND (freeMemState IN (1,2))

Report.Name: Performance: Top ESX By Disk I/O Activity With Details
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by disk I/O operations. Other disk I/O usage metrics are included.

Report.Name: Performance: Top ESX By Disk Read KBps
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by read disk I/O (KBps)

Report.Name: Performance: Top ESX By Disk Write KBps
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by write disk I/O (KBps)

Report.Name: Performance: Top ESX By Disk Latency With Details
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by disk I/O latency. Other disk I/O usage metrics are included.

Report.Name: Performance: Top ESX By Kernel Disk Read Latency
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by kernel disk I/O read latency.

Report.Name: Performance: Top ESX By Kernel Disk Write Latency
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by kernel disk I/O write latency.

Report.Name: Performance: Top ESX By Device Disk Read Latency
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by device disk I/O read latency

Report.Name: Performance: Top ESX By Device Disk Write Latency
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by device disk I/O write latency.

Report.Name: Performance: Top ESX By Network Activity With Details
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by network activity.

Report.Name: Performance: Top ESX By Inbound Net Utilization
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by inbound network utilization

Report.Name: Performance: Top ESX By Outbound Net Utilization
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by outbound network utilization

Report.Name: Performance: Top Datastores By Utilization
Report.Description: This report ranks datastores by utlization

Report.Name: Performance: Datastores with Lowest Free Space
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX datastore with lowest free space

Report.Name: Events: Physical to Virtual Machine Membership
Report.Description: This report enumerates Physical machine (ESX server) to Virtual machine meberships from event collection.

Report.Name: Availability: VMware Hardware Errors
Report.Description: Captures VMware hardware warning and critical errors.

Report.Name: Availability: VMware Hardware Status
Report.Description: Captures VMware hardware status

Report.Name: Performance: Top VMs By Datastore I/O Activity With Details
Report.Description: This report ranks virtual machines by datastore I/O activity. Other datastore I/O usage metrics are included.

Report.Name: Performance: Top VMs By Datastore Read KBps
Report.Description: This report ranks virtual machines by datastore I/O read (KBps)

Report.Name: Performance: Top VMs By Datastore Write KBps
Report.Description: This report ranks virtual machines by datastore I/O writes (KBps)

Report.Name: Performance: Top ESX By Datastore I/O Activity With Details
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by datsatore I/O operations. Other datastore I/O usage metrics are included.

Report.Name: Performance: Top ESX By Datastore Read KBps
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by read datastore I/O (KBps)

Report.Name: Performance: Top ESX By Datastore Write KBps
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by write datastore I/O (KBps)

Report.Name: Performance: Top VMWare Clusters By CPU Utilization
Report.Description: This report ranks VMWare clusters by CPU utilization

Report.Description: This report ranks VMWare clusters by memory utilization

Report.Description: This report ranks VMWare Clusters by datsatore I/O operations. Other datastore I/O usage metrics are included.

Report.Name: Performance: Top VMWare Clusters By Datastore Read KBps
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by read datastore I/O (KBps)

Report.Name: Performance: Top VMWare Clusters By Datastore Write KBps
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by write datastore I/O (KBps)

Report.Name: Performance: Top VMWare Resource Pools By CPU Utilization
Report.Description: This report ranks VMWare resource pools by CPU utilization

Report.Name: Performance: Top VMWare Resource Pools By Memory Utilization
Report.Description: This report ranks least utilized VMWare resource pools by memory utilization

Report.Name: Performance: Least Utilized VMWare Clusters By CPU
Report.Description: This report ranks least utilized VMWare clusters by CPU utilization

Report.Name: Performance: Least Utilized VMWare Clusters By Memory
Report.Description: This report ranks least utilized VMWare clusters by memory utilization

Report.Name: Performance: Least Utilized VMWare Clusters By Disk Read KBps
Report.Description: This report ranks least utlized VMware clusters by disk I/O read (KBps)

Report.Description: This report ranks least utilized VMWare clusters by disk I/O write volume (KBps)
